arguments.query: Bills passed by Trump 2017-2021 official names legislative numbers

results.title: These House Republicans Voted Against Trump's 'Big, Beautiful Bill' - Newsweek
results.snippet: President Donald Trump's "big, beautiful bill" again passed the GOP-controlled House of Representatives after a marathon few days.

results.title: Here's what's in Trump's "big, beautiful bill" passed by Congress - CBS News
results.snippet: The House and Senate passed the massive spending and tax bill that includes signature policies of President Trump's second-term agenda this week. Here's what's in it.

results.title: Bills and Resolutions in Congress -- GovTrack.us
results.snippet: There are 7,568 bills and resolutions currently before the United States Congress, but of those only about 7% will become law · 14 bills and resolutions are on the House and Senate calendars for the coming days

results.title: The House just passed Donald Trump’s ‘One Big, Beautiful Bill.’ Here’s what that means for you | The Independent
results.snippet: From tax cuts for wealthy Americans to cuts in benefits through Medicaid and SNAP, this legislation provides plenty of ammunition for the president’s political priorities.

results.title: PASSED: The One, Big, Beautiful Bill Moves One Step Closer to President Trump’s Desk – Ways and Means
results.snippet: The One, Big, Beautiful Bill makes permanent the successful 2017 Trump tax cuts and includes critical pro-growth policies that will cut taxes by an additional $1,300 for a family of four and deliver higher wages and incomes for millions of Americans. results.title: Trump's 2025 Executive Orders | Holland & Knight
results.snippet: Holland & Knight’s Public Policy & Regulation team members are actively monitoring and reviewing President Trump's executive orders and other actions. This chart provides brief overviews of the numerous orders published by the Trump Administration.

data.instruction: **Instruction:** Identify the specific bill passed by Trump that is the subject of this inquiry. Provide its official name, legislative number, and primary provisions.

delve_data.error: The search results indicate that the referenced 'big, beautiful bill' is likely a colloquial nickname for the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act of 2017 (H.R. 1), but no explicit legislative number or official name is confirmed in the retrieved content. Primary provisions mentioned include tax cuts for wealthy Americans, changes to Medicaid/SNAP benefits, and permanent 2017 tax cuts. Further clarification or source verification is needed for precise details.

data.verified_report:
VERIFIED REPORT: Identification of Trump-era "Big, Beautiful Bill"  
DIRECTIVE: Identify the specific bill passed by Trump that is the subject of this inquiry. Provide its official name, legislative number, and primary provisions.  

VERIFIED FINDINGS:  
• The "big, beautiful bill" referred to in the inquiry is likely the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act of 2017 (H.R. 1), though no explicit legislative number or official name is confirmed in the retrieved content (error message).  
• Primary provisions mentioned include tax cuts for wealthy Americans, changes to Medicaid/SNAP benefits, and permanent 2017 tax cuts (error message).  

ASSESSMENT:  
• Overall Confidence: Low  
• Key Contradictions: The provided data does not explicitly confirm the legislative number (H.R. 1) or official name (Tax Cuts and Jobs Act of 2017), despite the error message suggesting it as a likely candidate.  
• Notable Gaps: No direct sources or citations are provided to validate the claims about the bill’s provisions or legislative number.
